Scripts.OnMouseDown: NarciTooltip:FadeOut(); if self.Pushed and self.Icon then self.Pushed:SetTexCoord(self.Icon:GetTexCoord()) end

Scripts.OnTextChanged: local LetterNum = self:GetNumLetters() local w = math.max(LetterNum*10, 180) --self:GetParent().Background:SetWidth(w)

Scripts.OnLoad: self.tooltipHeadline = "Name Your Set -PH" self.tooltipLine1 = "Left-click to modify this text."
Scripts.OnTextChanged: NarciAPI.SmartFontType(self) local LetterNum = self:GetNumLetters() local w = math.max(LetterNum*16, 180) self:GetParent().Background:SetWidth(w)

Scripts.OnEnter: if self:GetParent():GetAlpha() ~= 1 then return; end if self:IsEnabled() then SetCursor("Interface/CURSOR/Cast.blp") end
Scripts.OnTextChanged: NarciAPI.SmartFontType(self) local LetterNum = self:GetNumLetters() local w = math.max(LetterNum*16, 160) self:SetWidth(w);

Scripts.OnLoad: self.tooltipFormat = Narci.L["Equipped Item Level Format"]; self.tooltipLine1 = STAT_AVERAGE_ITEM_LEVEL_TOOLTIP;
Minimap:HookScript("OnHide", function() self:Hide() end); Minimap:HookScript("OnShow", function() self:Show() end);
